changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS payments ( id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, info JSONB, total_price DECIMAL NOT NULL CHECK (total_price >= 0), created_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, expires_at TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL, reservation_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES reservations(id), user_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES users(id) );
